resources.string: "The previous backed up App data will be overwritten. Would you like to continue?"
"Do you want to stop the backup?"
"Do you want to stop the restoring?"
"Not enough storage, please clean the SD card and try again"
"Restore is stopping, please wait for a moment."
"The current App data will be overwritten. Would you like to continue?"
Phone memory is full, can\'t import messages any more, please delete some old messages.
""Backup and Recover" for the China Mobile custom phone, can be used on the China Mobile custom phone of all brands."

If you haven’t inserted an SD card, you can:
Backup via SD card
· Insert an SD card
· Start to backup
· Remove the SD card and insert it into the new device
· Open Backup app of the new device, restore the backup file by using restore function
Or operate via computer
· Start to backup and remember the backup location
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy file from backup location to computer
· Connect the new device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to new device
· Open Backup app of the new device, restore the backup file by using restore function


If no backup file being found and you haven’t inserted an SD card, you can:
Restore via SD card
· Insert an SD card to the former device (skip this step if it has already existed)
· Start to backup in former device
· Remove the SD card and insert it to this device
· Open Backup app of this device, restore the backup file by using restore function
Or operate via computer
· Connect the former device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to computer according to the hint of location from former device
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app according to its type (create the related folders if they don’t exist)
· Open Backup app of this device, restore the backup file by using restore function

If you haven’t inserted an SD card, you can:
Backup via SD card
· Insert an SD card
· Start to backup
· Remove the SD card and insert it into the new device
· Open Backup app of the new device, restore the backup file by using restore function
Or operate via computer
· Start to backup and remember the backup location
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy file from backup location to computer
· Connect the new device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to new device
· Open Backup app of the new device, restore the backup file by using restore function

If no backup file being found and you haven’t inserted an SD card, you can:
Restore via SD card
· Insert an SD card to the former device (skip this step if it has already existed)
· Start to backup in former device
· Remove the SD card and insert it to this device
· Open Backup app of this device, restore the backup file by using restore function
Or operate via computer
· Connect the former device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to computer according to the hint of location from former device
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app according to its type (create the related folders if they don’t exist)
· Open Backup app of this device, restore the backup file by using restore function

After backup, you can:
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file from Internal storage/backup to computer
· Connect the new device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to new device
· Open Backup app of the new device, restore the backup file by using restore function


If no backup file being found, you can:
· Connect the former device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to computer according to the hint of location from former device
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app according to its type (create the related folders if they don’t exist)
· Open Backup app of this device, restore the backup file by using restore function

After backup, you can:
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file from Internal storage/backup to computer
· Connect the new device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to new device
· Open Backup app of the new device, restore the backup file by using restore function

If no backup file being found, you can:
· Connect the former device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to computer according to the hint of location from former device
· Connect this device to computer and open its files
· Copy backup file to Internal storage/backup/data or Internal storage/backup/app according to its type (create the related folders if they don’t exist)
· Open Backup app of this device, restore the backup file by using restore function
No SD card is found. You can insert it first or copy backup file to new device by operating via computer to restore.\n
No backup file is found. You can copy it from former device to this one by transferring from SD card or operating via computer to restore.\n
You can copy backup file to new device by operating via computer to restore.\n
No backup file is found. You can copy it from former device to this one by operating via computer to restore.\n
"Not enough space, please clean up storage and try again"
SD card has been removed, please reset
"Set to restore to SD card, but can't find SD card"
